description.title: Giphy App description
description.value: The best way to search, share, and discover GIFs on the Internet

description_admin.title: Admin error description if the app cannot be used

description_agent.title: Agent error description if the app cannot be used
description_agent.value: Contact your Admin to have it activated.

title.title: Error title if the app cannot be used
title.value: To use Giphy Agent comments processed by Markdown should be activated.

error_404.title: Error if an image cannot be found

preview.title: Image preview instruction text
preview.value: Click Preview to see your GIF live

description.title: NSFW description text
description.value: Giphy may display images that are inappropriate for work. Click "I accept" if you understand that risk.
